contentList.content: Embrace Kereska's Force to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Your force spells deal additional Force damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage. Its force spells deal additional Force damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, it gains [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>. While attuned to Kereska's Force, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_Disintegrate">Disintegrate</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_MagicMissile">Magic Missile</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, gain 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_ZOC_FORCE_CONDUIT">Force Conduit</LSTag>.

Embrace Kereska's Radiance to gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Your radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, you can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.

Affected entity has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage. Its radiant spells deal additional Radiant damage equal to its <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>. When it deals spell damage, inflict [1] turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target. While attuned to Kereska's Radiance, it can cast <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Zone_Sunbeam">Sunbeam</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_GuidingBolt">Guiding Bolt</LSTag>.
When you deal damage with a spell, inflict 1 turn of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MAG_RADIANT_RADIATING_ORB">Radiant Orb</LSTag> upon the target.
